entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 5 May 2023
